general.title: Full-Stack Developer
general.bio: I am a proactive young developer with strong learning capacity, adaptability, and good performance in teamwork. I stand out for my discipline, responsibility, and commitment. I am willing to learn new skills and improve continuously, focused on developing efficient solutions. If you want to work together, do not hesitate to contact me!

about.title: About me
about.p1: I am passionate about building useful products...
about.p2: I enjoy working with React, Node, and databases.
